heading: 2.0.3 Patch Notes â€“ October 17th
content: Season 6 and Vessel of Hatred are here and the released our massive Season 6 Compendium a  week ago. Blizzard already applied several Vessel of Hatred hotfixes since the Diablo 4 expansion release on October 7th and the 2.0.3 Patch Notes has been announced, bringing a huge number of fixes and changes! As planned, the Spiritborn's will be nerfed. We hope you are enjoying your time on the new Season 6! The 2.0.2e Hotfix is now live for everyone: We hope you enjoy the Season of Hatred Rising and the Vessel of Hatred expansion with the aid of our Season 6 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 6 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes while following vrious Vessel of Hatred hotfixes. We're continuing to work on more updates for With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 5 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
